value.title: Starcraft 2: EASY Beginner Protoss Build Order Tutorial vs Terran [2020]
value.excerpt: Very powerful protoss build order vs terran. value.excerpt: Starcraft 2: Protoss vs Protoss guide/tutorial. Today we're learning an aggressive pvp opening with 8 adepts + 2 oracles.
